EmailTemplate.description: This notifies the partner that NCR has flagged a tech as certified.
EmailTemplate.name: NewCertEngineer
EmailTemplate.subject: New Engineer Certification Notification in Region {!Engineers__c.Account_Region__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This email is being sent to notify you that NCR has flagged your technician {!Engineers__c.First_Name__c} {!Engineers__c.Last_Name__c} related to {!Engineers__c.Partner_Account__c} as certified. Please complete the attached IPP Order Form and email to cd230061@ncr.com (Channel Diagnostics). Once this form is received diagnostic media will be ordered.
Please contact your partner manager with any questions.
Thanks,
NCR Channel Operations Team
